Package dataAccess

Class AppointmentCRUD

java.lang.Object
dataAccess.AppointmentCRUD
public abstract class AppointmentCRUD extends Object
This class contains methods for performing CRUD operations on Appointments stored in the MySQL database.
Author:
Jeramiah Coffey

    • getByCustomerId

      public static List<Appointment> getByCustomerId(int custId)
      Get Appointments by customer id.
      Parameters:
      custId - Unique customer id associated with the Appointment.
      Returns:
      A List of the customer's appointments.

    • getAll

      Get all Appointments.
      Returns:
      A List of all Appointments.

    • getTotals

      public static int getTotals(Month selectedMonth, String selectedType, Customer selectedCustomer)
      Get total count of appointments based on the filters passed in. Returns total count of all appointments if three null values are passed in.
      Parameters:
      selectedCustomer - Nullable Customer object with the ID to query for.
      selectedMonth - Nullable Month object with the value to query for.
      selectedType - Nullable string value of the type to query for.
